HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Doručení Balíkovnou na adresu domů: 69 Kč. Kurýrní služba GLS: 74 Kč. PPL kurýr: 74 Kč. A mandatory packing fee of 9 Kč is added to every order.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: GLS: 1-2 pracovních dní. PPL: do 24 hodin. Balíkovna na adresu: not specified.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Vyzvednutí v Zásilkovně: 49 Kč. PPL Parcel Shop: 49 Kč. Výdejní místo GLS: 54 Kč. Balíkovna: 54 Kč. Free delivery for orders over 1 499 Kč. A mandatory packing fee of 9 Kč is added to every order.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Zásilkovna (Z-BOX): 49 Kč. PPL Parcelbox: 49 Kč. Balíkovna-BOX: 54 Kč. Free delivery for orders over 1 499 Kč. A mandatory packing fee of 9 Kč is added to every order.
PARCEL_LOCKERS.cod_surcharge: 30 Kč (Note: For Balíkovna-BOX, payment must be made online before pickup)

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home Delivery, Parcel Shops, and Parcel Lockers are available. In-store pickup is not offered as a distinct service.
PROVIDERS: Home delivery via Balíkovna na adresu, GLS, and PPL. Pickup points network includes Zásilkovna, PPL Parcel Shop, GLS, and Balíkovna.
PRICING: Parcel pickup from 49 Kč. Home delivery from 69 Kč. A mandatory 9 Kč packing fee applies to all orders. Free shipping to pickup points for orders over 1 499 Kč. COD surcharge is 30 Kč.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Extensive network of over 26,000 pickup points. Fast delivery times specified for PPL (24h) and GLS (1-2 days).
LIMITATIONS: No express or weekend delivery options. No information on bulky item shipping. Free shipping is not available for home delivery.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is well-organized and clear, presented in a comparative table. It is comprehensive for standard services but lacks details on special delivery types.
